title: "VR Gradient Wallpapers"
content:
Welcome to our website featuring a collection of stunning wallpapers that showcase the beauty of virtual reality technology. Our wallpapers feature simple yet captivating illustrations of VR headsets against gradient backgrounds of contrasting colors, creating a visually striking effect on your desktop or mobile device. 

Whether you're a fan of VR gaming or simply love the futuristic look of VR technology, our collection has something for everyone. With a variety of color schemes and designs to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect wallpaper to suit your style.

All of our wallpapers are available in high-resolution and are free to download, making it easy to add a touch of tech-inspired flair to your device. So why wait? Browse our collection today and give your screen a fresh new look with our VR Gradient Wallpapers!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple illustration of a virtual reality headset, against a gradient background of two contrasting colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
